channel.title: Invisible Grenade Viewmodel and Glitchy Soldiers
channel.description:
#1 [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=516050164[/url]
I did not do "getpos" as I was not aware I supposed to at the time. Sorry, but you can still see where I am. In the chapter "Surface Tension" Near the end just before the fight with the carrier heli.
Title should explain what happened. But in-case it doesn't I was going to throw a grenade into a truck to clear out a turret. I quicksaved and then missed the throw because of bms's dumb grenade throwing physics. So I reloaded to try again and the grenade viewmodel appeared invisible.
#2-4
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=516050243[/url]
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=516050210[/url]
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=516050184[/url]
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=515802393[/url]
Once again, didn't do getpos.
I hope this gets fixed.
